Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr

Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr Class Reference

Shared pointer implementation used to share index buffers. More...

Detailed Description

Shared pointer implementation used to share index buffers.

OGRE_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX Ogre::SharedPtr< HardwareVertexBuffer >::SharedPtr (   )  [inherited]
 

Constructor, does not initialise the SharedPtr.

Remarks:
Dangerous! You have to call bind() before using the SharedPtr.
